__e: Mrs. Fletcher, I know what you think, but you're wrong.
And Dr. Fletcher, I'm sure you have heard of this:
Mrs. Fletcher, I know Dan well enough to know he'd never hurt anyone, no matter what.
Mr. Fletcher has a new job for us then, Sir?
Ms. Fletcher thought it might be best if you were here.
I'll bet you do. And I suppose Ms. Fletcher also saw this car had no driver.
Mrs. Fletcher, do you know how hard it is to sit in someone's living room... when they'd rather be watchin' television and tell 'em how rich they're gonna be after they're dead?
Ms. Fletcher, you really think this is gonna prove anything?
[Chuckles] Uh, Mrs. Fletcher, you're a nice lady, but, uh, I think you're making a big mistake.
